Docs.summary: Information you can retrieve about a particular piece of test instrumentation.

remarks.para: Information you can retrieve about a particular piece of test instrumentation. This corresponds to information collected from the AndroidManifest.xml's <instrumentation> tag.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ TargetProcesses { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.TargetProcesses : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Names of the process(es) this instrumentation will run in.

remarks.para: Names of the process(es) this instrumentation will run in. If not specified, only runs in the main process of the targetPackage. Can either be a comma-separated list of process names or '*' for any process that launches to run targetPackage code.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
